name: Work Adventure
description:
Whoa, a text based game in 2015? That's what I thought too! This game is made by an amateur game developer (as you can see) and it would be much appreciated if you left feedback by sending it to My Email!

This text based adventure game takes place in the life of an ordinary male who goes to work one day and accidentally installs a virus, who is then fired and declared homeless. He then has to take on the virus to get his life back.

Pretty interesting right?

Well download the free early access beta demo today!
